name: Crypt (itch) (biya0)
description:
Imagine you are a vampire who has suddenly awoken from a century long slumber. You are confused and somehow injured, stuck in a crypt, and most importantly thirsty for blood. What must you do in order to escape?

Crypt is a dark fantasy single player puzzle game where you play as a injured vampire who tries to escape the crypt that he is trapped in. You will explore each room of the crypt with limited vision and solve puzzles with the limited moves that you are given. Interact with pressure plates and levers, avoid torches that burn your skin, and find rats to quell your blood cravings. Use the least amount moves possible to get to the door and escape the crypt before you run out of blood.

- High quality hand-drawn art inspired by gothic medieval architecture and art. 

- Dark fantasy and horror atmosphere that enhance your experience. 

- Puzzles that progressively get harder and challenge your ability. 

WASD + Arrow keys - Movement

E - Interaction Key

Spacebar - Restart Level

developed by Functional Family Studio.
